data.comment: The match is underway in Varberg.
Can Varbergs get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Hacken's half?
In the minute 2, Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
Hacken are whistled for offside.
Varbergs have been awarded a corner by Kristoffer Karlsson.
In the minute 4, Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
Varbergs's Jesper Modig has been booked in Varberg.
Hacken are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 8, Daleho Irandust for Hacken drives towards goal at Paskbergsvallen. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Throw-in Hacken.
Kristoffer Karlsson awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Hacken in the half of Varbergs.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a throw-in for Hacken, close to Varbergs's area.
Kristoffer Karlsson awards Varbergs a goal kick.
In the minute 15, Hacken to take a throw-in in Varbergs territory.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Varbergs in their own half.
Varbergs have a goal kick.
In the minute 17, Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Hacken in the half of Varbergs.
In the minute 19, Ball safe as Varbergs is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
In Varberg a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 23, Tashreeq Matthews for Varbergs gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
Goal kick for Hacken at Paskbergsvallen.
Throw-in for Hacken at Paskbergsvallen.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
Hacken's Leo Bengtsson scores with his head to give his side a 0-1 lead.
Erik Friberg instrumental with a fine assist.
In the minute 27, Hacken surge into the attack at Paskbergsvallen but Alexander Faltsetasâ€™s header is off-target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Varberg.
Hacken will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Varbergs.
In the minute 29, Ball goes out of play for a Hacken goal kick.
Throw-in for Varbergs in their own half.
Ahmed Yasin puts the ball in the net and the away team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 0-2.
In the minute 31, Leo Bengtsson with an assist there.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Varbergs in their own half.
Hacken awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 34, Ball safe as Varbergs is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Hacken in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 37, Varbergs have been given a penalty at Paskbergsvallen...
Goal! Astrit Seljmani nets a penalty for Varbergs. They now trail 1-2.
The home team have replaced Adama Fofana with Gideon Mensah. This is the first substitution made today by Joakim Persson.
In the minute 40, Varbergs have a dangerous throw-in.
Varbergs's Luke Le Roux breaks free at Paskbergsvallen. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Kristoffer Karlsson awards Hacken a goal kick.
In the minute 42, Kristoffer Karlsson signals a Varbergs throw-in in Hacken's half.
Varbergs awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick Varbergs.
In the minute 44, Varbergs to take a throw-in in Hacken territory.
Free kick for Varbergs in their own half.
The fourth official's board shows 1 minutes, which will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
The first half has been concluded at Paskbergsvallen.
The second-half has started.
In the minute 46, Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
Hacken awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
Varbergs pushes forward through Gustaf Norlin, whose finish on goal is saved.
In the minute 49, Gustaf Norlin (Varbergs) gets a yellow card.
Luke Le Roux of Varbergs smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
In the minute 51, Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Varbergs in their own half.
Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Varbergs.
In the minute 53, Throw-in Hacken.
Free kick for Hacken in the half of Varbergs.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Varbergs just outside Hacken's area.
In the minute 55, Jon Birkfeldt (Varbergs) gets up for a header but cannot keep the ball on target.
Goal kick for Hacken at Paskbergsvallen.
Free kick for Varbergs in their own half.
In the minute 56, Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Varbergs at Paskbergsvallen.
Free kick Varbergs.
In the minute 60, Corner awarded to Varbergs.
Varbergs's Tashreeq Matthews misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Varberg.
In the minute 61, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Important block from the Varbergs defence as Ahmed Yasin fires in a strike for Hacken.
Corner awarded to Hacken.
In the minute 62, Leo Bengtsson (Hacken) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Hacken have been awarded a corner by Kristoffer Karlsson.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Varbergs in their own half.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Varbergs.
In the minute 64, Viktor Lundberg is on a sub for Daleho Irandust for Hacken.
Varbergs have been awarded a corner by Kristoffer Karlsson.
In the minute 66, Varbergs's Robin Tranberg is on target but unsuccessful.
Free kick for Hacken in their own half.
Hacken push forward at Paskbergsvallen and Ahmed Yasin gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Varbergs defence.
In the minute 67, In Varberg Hacken attack through Ahmed Yasin. The finish is off target, however.
Ball goes out of play for a Varbergs goal kick.
In Varberg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
In the minute 68, Free kick Varbergs.
Alexander Faltsetas (Hacken) has received a first yellow card.
In Varberg, Luke Le Roux of Varbergs is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 69, Hacken have a goal kick.
Kristoffer Karlsson awards the away team a throw-in.
Corner awarded to Hacken.
In the minute 71, Goal! Hacken extend their lead to 1-3 thanks to a Alexander Faltsetas header.
That's a fine assist from Leonard Zuta.
Kristoffer Karlsson awards Hacken a goal kick.
In the minute 73, Goal kick for Varbergs at Paskbergsvallen.
Alibek Aliev is replacing Tashreeq Matthews for Varbergs at Paskbergsvallen.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Hacken in their own half.
Throw-in for Varbergs in their own half.
In the minute 74, Astrit Seljmani is booked for the home team.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a Varbergs throw-in in Hacken's half.
In the minute 75, Ball goes out of play for a Hacken goal kick.
Corner awarded to Hacken.
Throw-in for Hacken in the half of Varbergs.
In the minute 78, Johan Hammar is replacing Alexander Soderlund for the away team.
The away team replace Erik Friberg with Gustav Berggren.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Hacken close to the penalty box.
In the minute 79, Hacken's Rasmus Lindgren gets his shot away but it misses the target.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Varberg.
Varbergs make their third substitution with Robin Tranberg replacing Luke Le Roux.
In the minute 80, Albin Winbo is on a sub for Erion Sadiku for Varbergs.
Joakim Persson (Varbergs) is making a fourth substitution, with Alexander Johansson replacing Jesper Modig.
Can Hacken get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Varbergs's half?
In the minute 82, Hacken are pushing forward but Gustav Berggren's finish is wide of the goal.
Varbergs have a goal kick.
Kristoffer Karlsson signals a Varbergs throw-in in Hacken's half.
In the minute 83, Varbergs have been awarded a corner by Kristoffer Karlsson.
Hacken awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Varbergs in the half of Hacken.
In the minute 84, Varbergs's Robin Tranberg gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Hacken defender.
Corner awarded to Varbergs.
Hacken have a goal kick.
In the minute 86, Ball safe as Hacken is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In Varberg Hacken attack through Gustav Berggren. The finish is off target, however.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Varberg.
In the minute 87, Kristoffer Karlsson signals a free kick to Varbergs.
Kristoffer Karlsson awards the away team a throw-in.
Hacken's Leo Bengtsson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 89, Kristoffer Karlsson awards Varbergs a goal kick.
Varbergs have been awarded a corner by Kristoffer Karlsson.
Varbergs attack but Astrit Seljmani's header doesn't find the target.
Goal kick for Hacken at Paskbergsvallen.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
In Varberg a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Corner awarded to Hacken.
Throw-in Varbergs.
Can Hacken get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Varbergs's half?
Throw-in for Hacken in the half of Varbergs.
Throw-in high up the field for Hacken in Varberg.
Hacken to take a throw-in in Varbergs territory.
Kristoffer Karlsson blows to end the match. The final score is 1-3.
Andreas Alm is making the team's fourth substitution at Paskbergsvallen with Adam Andersson replacing Leo Bengtsson.
